comments.body:
Nit: put the Spark imports after the third-party imports.

Also, doesn't the Mesos documentation need to change to reflect this slightly different logic? the same file updated in https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/5065/files
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,46 @@

comments.body: @srowen Yes, I've known that I should fit import orders, but I missed it. And I will also update the description.
